articles.title: "Make Him Captain": Dinesh Karthik Backs This Star To Lead At Asian Games. It's Not Shikhar Dhawan - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Reports have emerged that Shikhar Dhawan is likely to lead the India team at the Asian Games in Hangzhou.

articles.title: A $7.5 Billion Derivative Trade Shifts to India as SGX Feud Ends - Bloomberg
articles.description: Derivative contracts with a notional value of about $7.5 billion traded in Singapore will shift to India as a cross-border trading link between the two Asian countries’ top bourses gets fully operational on Monday.

articles.title: The Supreme Court's affirmative action ruling may hurt some Asian Americans - The Washington Post
articles.description: While Asian Americans became the face of a Supreme Court case against affirmative action, the lawsuit exposed a rift in the community, parts of which say it will hurt them.

articles.title: Dipika Pallikal, Harinder Sandhu clinch gold at Asian mixed doubles Squash Championships - Khel Now
articles.description: India clinched two medals: Gold and Bronze: in the Asian mixed doubles Squash Championships.
